thread.title: Women and their stories about the war
thread.title_full: Women and their stories about the war

title: Women and their stories about the war
text:
Women and their stories about the war Women and their stories about the war Next Story Prev Story 2 hrs ago Read more: Border Mail 
A MELBOURNE author honoured a promise after visiting one of the women featured in her book while on the Border yesterday. Before her presentation she had one important stop-off, a surprise visit with one of her subjects - 99-year-old Daphne McKibbin in her Albury nursing home.   Border Mail.
